title: Harnessing exoelectrogens in a novel microbial desalination cell: a study on the impact of salinity on sago effluent treatment and power generation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00081A, Paper
Sandhya Prakash, Samsudeen Naina Mohamed, Kalaichelvi Ponnusamy
The impact of salinity on the performance of exoelectrogens in the novel MDC was studied. MDC – 1 performed better at 30 g L−1 NaCl concentration and MDC – 2 performed better in brackish water.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
